thread.title: Cindy Crawford reacts to friend Amal Clooney's pregnancy news
thread.title_full: Cindy Crawford reacts to friend Amal Clooney's pregnancy news

author: harpersbazaar.com
title: Cindy Crawford reacts to friend Amal Clooney's pregnancy news
text:
Cindy Crawford is the latest of George and Amal Clooney's A-list friends to comment on their baby news. Following confirmation from Matt Damon last week , Crawford has spoken about the happy news while on a promotional engagement in Sydney over the weekend. "Oh, so it's actually be confirmed," Crawford told The Today Show . "Thank heavens! I had to keep that in for months."
Crawford and her husband Rande Gerber are known to be close friends of the Clooneys and were just two of the famous people to attend their beautiful Italian wedding in 2014 .
 Later, in an interview with Today Extra , Crawford went on to answer if she had any parenting advice she has for the couple.
"My mother's best advice to us was don't give advice unless someone asks for it," she said. "I would never volunteer advice. If someone asks me I would tell them, but I'm not the person just like, 'Oh here's what you should do.' I guess my only advice would be to enjoy it. Because, as you know, because you have a little one, it goes like that."
Getty From: Harper's BAZAAR UK
